name: mcp-json-yaml-toml
description: Query, transform, and manipulate JSON, YAML, and TOML files using jq-style expressions with schema validation
long_description: Provides AI agents with powerful tools to work with structured data files. Use jq/yq expressions to extract and transform data, perform CRUD operations on specific paths, validate files against JSON schemas from SchemaStore.org, convert between formats, and deep merge files. Preserves comments and formatting in YAML and TOML files.

tools.name: data_query
tools.description: Extract and transform data using jq/yq expressions without modifying files

tools.name: data
tools.description: Get, set, or delete values at specific paths in structured data files

tools.name: data_schema
tools.description: Validate files against schemas, manage SchemaStore.org associations

tools.name: data_convert
tools.description: Convert files between JSON, YAML, and TOML formats

tools.name: data_merge
tools.description: Deep merge two structured data files into one
